listing.listing_description:
Overlooking the seventeenth hole of the stunning course at the Apes Hill Golf and Polo Club in the St. James area of Barbados, Villa Cocomaya offers spectacular ocean and fairway views in a tranquil setting spotted with tropical foliage. From the chef services and housekeeping to amenities akin to those at a boutique hotel, this private vacation rental makes a great bet for a family or a special event like a wedding. Get the holiday you deserve!

The grounds at Villa Cocomaya benefit from a large covered terrace, sun deck, gazebo and infinity-edge swimming pool. Sizzle up something delicious on the barbeque before dipping in for some alfresco dining. You will also find plenty of sun loungers and sun beds. Inside, there are perks such as a coffee machine, wine fridge, ice maker, Wi-Fi, media room and sound system.

Designed with luxury living in mind, the interiors of Villa Cocomaya are beautifully decorated. The kitchen is fully equipped with Miele appliances and includes convenient design and a breakfast nook. Or relax with a good book and an even better glass of wine on one of the plush couches in the living area. Large vanishing doors create seamless transitions between indoors and out.

Five stylish bedrooms with en-suite bathroom accommodate up to ten guests at this non-smoking villa. The master suite features a king size bed, bidet, walk-in closet, dressing area, living area and private balcony with outdoor furniture. Two suites offer queen size beds, and the others have or two convertible king to twins. These suites also have dressing areas, lounges, walk-in closets and direct access to a balcony or terrace.

When you’re not at the beach, you might head to the excellent Green Monkey and Royal Westmoreland courses located within a short drive from Villa Cocomaya. If you’re planning your trip during mid-February, be sure to check out the wonderful festival in Holetown that includes crafts, music and parades that reveal the unique culture of this iconic Caribbean island. The capital city Bridgetown also makes a great day excursion where you can take in the historical sites and visit the famous Mount Gay Rum Distillery.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Discover one of the original—and still one of the best—resorts in the Dominican Republic at Villa Palmas 11. Part of the exclusive, now-legendary Casa de Campo property, this luxury Caribbean vacation rental is fully staffed and overlooks a private golf course near Minitas Beach. Though its seven suite-style bedrooms can accommodate the whole family, no detail is overlooked in the elegantly appointed living spaces, inside and out.

Use the villa to host an intimate tropical wedding (after which the newlyweds can escape to a neighboring villa for their honeymoon) or a relaxed reunion—then share photos via the home’s Wi-Fi. Sun-seekers can claim a lounge chair by the heated pool, children can play in the water, and the grown-ups can choose a sunny or shaded lounge area for a catch-up. As the sun sets, start up one or both of the charcoal barbecues and serve the meal at the al-fresco dining area. Of course, since your stay includes the services of a cook, butler and maid, you can always leave dinner to the staff. If you’d like to play a round or see more of the resort, electric golf carts are available to rent.

The gracious living rooms at Villa Palmas 11 make subtle use of color, pattern and texture for a refined modern look. In the sitting room and television lounge, the side chairs, area rugs and drapes carry the blue and white color scheme in geometric prints, while potted plants, woven chairs and tabletop sculptures add to the visual interest. The formal dining area has both organic influences and mid-century flair, thanks to the mix of a natural-fiber rug and leaf-shaped sconces with Sputnik-style chandeliers. In the fully equipped kitchen, you’ll find more of the cheery blue and white on the stools at the breakfast bar, playing off a crisp scheme of mixed gray and white counters and cabinets.

The same lively color and pattern give each of the seven bedroom suites its own personality. All the bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, so they feel just as private as hotel rooms; the master suite has a king bed, lounge area and balcony and the other six bedrooms have two queen beds and access to either the terrace or a balcony.

From the setting of Villa Palmas 11 on the fourth hole of the La Romana Country Club golf course, it’s a 10-minute walk to the start of the course, barely a 2-mile drive to the Dye Fore Golf Course and a 10.5-mile drive to La Estancia Golf Course. Guests who prefer not to golf can make the 2.5-mile drive to beautiful Minitas Beach or sample the shopping and dining in La Romana, 6 miles away. If you’re on a longer holiday, take a day trip to Santo Domingo, 84 miles away. At the end of your trip, plan on a 7.5-mile drive from Casa de Campo to La Romana International Airport.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perched above Ffryes Beach, one of Antigua’s most beautiful stretches of sand, this stylish villa features amazing ocean views from nearly every inch of its interior, balcony, and all four en-suite bedrooms. Located within the Tamarind Hills resort community, you and your guests will love the convenience of this beachside residence, as well as its extensive list of nearby attractions.

Tamarind Hills celebrates its beautiful environment with an open-air, open concept design that invites the fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight to fill its interior spaces. The pure white walls, deep wood tones, and bright contemporary accent pieces create the perfect contrast to the vibrant blues and greens of Antigua while conveying a sophisticated elegance that is ideal for any occasion. On the balcony, you’ll appreciate the extra lounge area, wrap-around infinity pool, daybeds, and a garden.

In the morning, you’ll find the fully equipped kitchen’s breakfast bar to be a great spot for a casual meal. When a more formal setting is desirable, the dining table inside features seating for six, as does the alfresco set on the balcony. Inside, you’ll appreciate Wi-Fi, cable television, air conditioning, complimentary parking, and twenty-four-hour security during your amazing beach vacation.

Ffryes and Darkwood beaches are both just a five-minute walk from Tamarind Hills, and both offer pristine white sand, crystal clear waters, and beachfront restaurants. For an elegant night out, enjoy dinner at Sheer Rocks, one of the island’s highest-rated dining establishments. If you’d prefer something more casual, visit Jackie O’s or Dennis’s Bar, both are located along the beach and feature extensive cocktail menus and incredible views of the sunset. If you’d like to learn about the island’s colonial history, visit the English Harbour, which is home to most of Antigua’s historical sites. And, if you’re feeling adventurous, head to Green Island, on the northern coast, for a wide range of water sports activities, and lessons.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located in Maundays Bay in Anguilla, Infinity at Sheriva villa successfully harmonizes traditional Caribbean style with touches from the Far East. Known for its pristine white sand beaches and clear turquoise seas, Anguilla offers a casual island tempo so you can get the rest and relaxation you deserve. With postcard perfect views of neighboring St. Martin and the Caribbean Sea, this chic villa redefines the art of luxury escape.

All three main level rooms have direct access to the expansive terrace which leads to the infinity swimming pool with a built-in hot tub. You will find a second swimming pool on the lower deck. Step out of the water into an alfresco shower. The elegant shared spaces offer tech-savvy comforts such as plasma televisions, DVD players, poolside Bose surround sound and Wi-Fi so that your stay can be as relaxing or as festive as you desire. Fire up the barbeque and enjoy some outdoor dining as you overlook the tropical landscape. A complimentary golf cart helps you zip around. Indoors, you will find a media room with a wet bar. Your reservation includes housekeeping, night security and a variety of perks.

The finest materials accent every inch of this expansive haven including exquisite marble floors and balustrades, exotic hardwood ceilings and immaculate granite countertops. The sunken living room exudes the richness of elegant island living. The kitchen offers contemporary comforts such as GE Monogram appliances.

The Grand Villa Suite features a walk-in dressing room, Balinese daybed lounge area, double showers and an infinity-edge marble bathtub. The ground floor offers a two-bedroom suite with a media room with wet bar and kitchenette. The king en-suite with garden view boasts a heavenly bathroom accented with marble and travertine. The king garden suite with its unique ‘tunnel’ design rounds out the ground floor. The Loft Suite has a balcony, kitchenette and adjacent sun terrace. The eight bedrooms accommodate up to eighteen guests.

Due to its pristine decor and idyllic tropical setting, Infinity at Sheriva has become a popular spot for weddings and other special events. The villa is perfect for large family get-togethers and corporate retreats. Additional rate-inclusive services include a welcome wine basket, afternoon canapés, complimentary shuttle service to Maundays Bay beach, beach chairs and umbrellas as well as signing privileges at Cap Juluca’s three world class restaurants – Pimms, Blu and Spice.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find your own Caribbean paradise at Nevaeh. Set on a private, gated lot that stretches down to a half-mile of pristine beach on Anguilla’s Long Bay, this luxury oceanfront vacation rental boasts stunning views and pampering service. Taking its design cues from local architecture and Balinese decor alike, this luxury villa has a breezy modern feel, and nine bedrooms spread between the main house and guest house offer generous accommodations.

Your stay at Nevaeh includes full breakfast, chef service for three meals per day, butler service, ground transfers on Anguilla, open bar and your very own four-seater UTV and golf carts for cruising around the villa property and through the local village. Challenge friends or family to a game on the tennis/basketball court or at beach volleyball, or take the kayaks and sea scooters out to explore the bay. Stretch out on a lounge chair on the beach or on the terrace by the infinity pool and hot tub. After a day in the water or the sun, there’s nothing like fresh seafood, grilled on the barbecue and served at the al-fresco dining area. Stay out for some stargazing from the hot tub, set the mood with the Sonos sound system or head inside to the home theater room or high-tech golf simulator. Massages or yoga sessions can be arranged under the ocean terrace gazebo

Nevaeh is laid out around a charming central courtyard but furnished on a grand scale, making the house feel both stately and inviting. A Japanese-style garden sets a serene tone in the courtyard that’s continued by the Balinese temple doors, carved wooden sofas and chairs and oversized lanterns in the living room and the casual wicker furniture and polished wood cabinets in the adjoining media room. The calm, refined vibe continues in the fully equipped kitchen, which pairs palm motifs and stone countertops with gourmet appliances and a large breakfast bar.

There are five bedrooms in the main house at Nevaeh, three in the guest house and a free-standing cabana, so the property can easily accommodate events like a family reunion, milestone birthday celebration or small wedding (and even the honeymoon after). In the main house, each bedroom has a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and one of the suites has an outdoor heated plunge pool. The guest house has one master bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathroom and two bedrooms with two queen beds each, that share a bathroom.  There is also a second kitchen and living area in the guest house.

If you’re dreaming of a Caribbean beach vacation, you’re in luck: a holiday at Nevaeh puts you right on Long Bay Beach, one of the most private and beautiful beaches on Anguilla. Practice on the home’s golf simulator before heading out to the real thing at Cuisinart Resort Golf Course, 3.2 km away, and find several gourmet dining spots a short golf cart ride away on Meads Bay Beach, one of the most popular spots on the island. At the end of your trip, catch a boat from Blowing Point Ferry Terminal, 6.5 km away, or a flight from Clayton J. Lloyd International Airport, 10 km away.

listing.listing_description:
Marvel at the sunset from your private hot tub at this oceanfront villa on St. Martin. Walk barefoot to Plum Bay Beach for a swim in the surf, and return to cocktail parties under the starry sky. Perched in the prestigious Terres Basses area on the island's west coast, Giselle balances vintage Caribbean elegance, state-of-the-art comforts, and an open, free-flowing design that bathes your every moment in the spirit of the sea. 

The symmetrical house features a capacious central living room opening to a shaded veranda and expansive pool terrace with panoramic ocean views. The terrace is perfect for special parties or carefree days under the immense sky, while the covered lounge area forms a cool retreat for afternoon refreshments or cocktail parties.

A light-filled kitchen forms the fulcrum of the home, with a 2-sided window bar serving the veranda and terrace. The main dining room includes a table for 12 beneath vaulted ceilings of whitewashed wood, with wide thresholds creating a breezy, alfresco ambiance. The spacious living room balances an ancient minimalism with vintage modern-chic furniture and Buddhist artwork, perfect for lively gatherings or tranquil relaxation into the wee hours.

Four of the villa's bedrooms open directly to the pool terrace, while the fifth suite enjoys extra privacy with its own entrance and kitchenette. All have king beds, ensuite bathrooms, and air conditioning, providing comfortable havens for a family, group of friends, or destination wedding guests.

While Giselle's location on the island's westernmost edge offers some of the finest views and beach access on St. Martin, it's also within easy reach of the island's main towns and nightlife spots. Enjoy the vibrant markets of nearby Marigot, the world-class shopping in Philipsburg, and some of the region's most renowned restaurants in Grand Case.

listing.listing_description:
Please inquire with us for holiday rates.

Nestled along Reeds Bay in the West Coast, this classy, five-bedroom home sits on manicured grounds complete with swaying Royal palm trees—it’s one of our top Barbados vacation rentals. Known as “Little England,” the island of Barbados combines British charm and Caribbean flair and is a popular gateway for visitors looking for sun, tranquil waters and vibrant nightlife.

There are enough amenities on this estate that you’ll feel like you’re on a private resort. Unwind on one of the lounge chairs on the sun deck, and if you need to cool down, go for a refreshing swim in the pool. The home’s multi-level terraces also offer respite from the sun; on the lower level you’ll find a casual outdoor living and dining area. Kids and the young at heart will appreciate the games room that boasts both a pool table and foosball; this room also doubles as a well-equipped exercise room.

Inside this coral-stone villa are marble floors and high-end furnishings. The formal living room is done in pleasing, neutral tones with elegant furniture and home decor. You won’t need to worry about cooking—your stay includes the services of a chef. Enjoy dinners either in the interior dining room, or head to the gazebo for an alfresco meal under a unique chandelier. Other on-site staff includes a butler, two maids and a night guard.

This villa’s five bedrooms can accommodate up to 10 guests. Each suite is similar in size and features, making it a perfect getaway for a group of friends. All rooms offer air conditioning, a private en-suite bathroom, satellite television, separate dressing room, a walk-in power shower and a king size bed. Four of the rooms are located upstairs, and include private balconies overlooking the sea.

Whether you feel like sunbathing or swimming, the beach is only steps away from Moon Reach! The shops and restaurants of Speightstown and Holetown are also near the villa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With the sea stretching in front and the sky stretching overhead, the views seem infinite at Stargazer. Whether you’re sunbathing on the terrace, swimming in the infinity pool, or strolling the lush gardens, this luxurious beachfront villa puts you in touch with the natural beauty of Thompson Cove on the island of Providenciales. With six bedrooms and a fully equipped guest house, it offers privacy, comfort and quiet, too.

Stargazer offers a pampering experience indoors and out. The gated property includes a cutting garden, fruit trees, a grotto and waterfall, a three-zone infinity pool, hot tub and sauna—not to mention beach access. Up your game on the tennis courts; racquets and a ball gatherer are available. If you’re not relaxing or dining on the terrace or grilling outside, enjoy the games room, pool table, home theatre, dance and Pilates studios and Wi-Fi access indoors.

Not only are the villa’s rooms air-conditioned, they have breezy, European-influenced decor. The open-plan living area is covered by a whitewashed cathedral ceiling and has plenty of plump white sofas and wicker chairs, but is grounded by exotic pieces like Persian rugs and Chinese-style chests. Enjoy meals at the two dining tables or the breakfast bar. The state-of-the-art kitchen makes cooking a pleasure with high-end appliances and spacious layout.

There are three bedrooms in the villa’s main house, two in the guest cottage and one in the poolside cottage. In the main house, all three bedrooms have king beds and en-suite bathrooms and two have balconies as well. In the guest cottage, the two bedrooms have a king bed and queen bed, respectively, and share a bathroom. The poolside cottage’s bedroom has a queen bed.

The services of a chef, nighttime server and villa manager are included in your visit. During your stay, the villa’s staff can also arrange spa treatments and adventure activities. Though the views from Thompson Cove are mostly of sea and sky, Stargazer is very close to the heart of Providenciales, just a 5-minute drive from the airport and a 12-minute drive from the golf course.

Read more about Stargazer Villa in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/2015/07/stargazer-villa-turks-and-caicos/)

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
You arrive at Encore along a long, inviting drive filled with palms, exotic tropical flowers, trees and shrubs. Beautiful gardens fill the entry courtyard and completely surround the villa. The Moorish inspired soaring arched entrance showcases the glimpse of brilliant sapphire blue Caribbean Sea and sky as you enter the cool interiors. The turquoise pool, framed by palms and flamboyant, runs the length of the terrace connecting the villa with the view.

Inside the villa, the expansive spaces offer multi areas for relaxing, dining and cooking. Refined travertine tile floors harmoniously flow throughout. Floor to ceiling sliding doors open to the view and the breezes. The spacious, well-equipped kitchen is one of the largest on island, providing a perfect platform to create inspired gourmet meals. Light woods, granite and travertine are accented by stainless appliances including two professional sized refrigerators. Wrap around countertops provides spacious indoor dining overlooking the chef’s preparations and the view. The double living room is divided by color; one side a blend of neutrals and the other blending white plus color. The style mixes contemporary with a touch of exotic.

The outdoor spaces take full advantage of the view and the gorgeous gardens. Multiple seating areas are scattered around the terraces providing large outdoor dining and comfortable seating opportunities. A built in BBQ sits off the lower dining area. Sculpted loungers surround the heated pool. Exotic plantings are embedded in the terrace. Overhead, under the covered areas, Singapore style fans provide gentle breezes. For an enhanced view, a covered roof terrace creates a poetic perch to view the Caribbean Sea.

The five equal size bedrooms connect off the terrace. Each one has an incredible view. The stylish spa style bathrooms have sea views plus outdoor showers with private seating. It’s a beautiful way to connect with tropical nature. The bedroom décor mixes interesting contemporary lines and textures with exotic touches like teak poster beds, interesting art and tranquil colors. A sixth garden view bedroom is a recent addition to the property designed and decorated with the same contemporary touches of the original five bedrooms. A nicely equipped gym, with outdoor shower and sea view are just off the great room.

You are secluded, yet close to amenities. The fabulous restaurants and food purveyors in Baie Nettle are a few minutes’ drive. You are 8 minutes to the French capital of Marigot, with its shops, restaurants, markets and galleries and 10 minutes to the airport. Grand Case and Philipsburg are 30 minutes away.

listing.listing_description:
True to its name, Villa Seacliff offers spectacular views from the tip of Ocean Point on Providenciales. Enjoy a panorama stretching from tropical landscaping to the turquoise waters of Chalk Sound while relaxing on the property’s terrace or private swimming dock. Though there’s plenty of communal space, five bedroom suites give couples or families their privacy.

The villa has several levels of outdoor spaces from which to enjoy the ocean views and trade winds. A deck just off the house has both sunny and shaded areas to lounge and dine, an outdoor grill and a pool. Head down the steps to the gazebo, perfect for reading or napping, and a swimming deck right on the water. In the evenings, enjoy cable television, Wi-Fi access and air-conditioned bedrooms.

With their cladding of textured coral stone, the walls of Villa Seacliff almost feel like they’ve risen out of the land. The living areas are casual and comfortable, with cathedral ceilings, an open-plan layout, stone floors that match the walls’ creamy color, and breezy wicker furniture accented by tropical floral-print cushions. The fully equipped kitchen features handsome wood cabinets, stainless steel appliances and a breakfast bar.

Each of the five bedrooms at Villa Seacliff has a king bed, en-suite bathroom with shower, air conditioning and a ceiling fan. There’s no need to worry about who will take which room; every room has a view of the sea. In the bedrooms, the same coral stone walls and pale floors set a calm, neutral tone, while botanical-print duvets and shams provide tropical accents. In the bathrooms, stone tile adds a colorful touch.

Though you can swim at the villa, Taylor Bay Beach is just a 2-minute walk away if you’re longing for a stretch of sand. You can also reach a tennis court on foot, 3 minutes away. By car, it’s a 10-minute drive to the international airport, a 15-minute drive to the grocery store and a 20-minute drive to the golf course and downtown area.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Let the green of the fairways and the blue of the pool form a vibrant backdrop to your Punta Cana holiday at Villa Spero. This expansive vacation rental has beautiful outdoor living areas facing the golf course and elegant interiors with space for ten friends or family members. Easy access to the Punta Cana Resort and Club and the beach means your stay can be as active or relaxed as you like.

Villa guests have access to golf, tennis, horseback riding, windsurfing and spa treatments at the nearby Punta Cana Resort and Club, subject to availability and extra costs. The villa has its own private pool, hot tub, and al-fresco lounging and dining areas outside, and a media room, satellite TV and Wi-Fi inside.

A palm-lined drive and planters set a tone of tropical elegance that continues inside this luxury property in colorful tile and colonial-inspired furniture. Pale-wood accents and slipcovered chairs add a casual, beachy feel in the living and dining rooms, and in the fully equipped kitchen, pops of bright yellow bring a little island sunshine indoors.

Villa Spero has two bedrooms with king beds and living areas, and two bedrooms with two full beds each. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, ceiling fans and TVs, and two of the bedrooms also have their own balconies.

The villa is just a short drive from hot spots like Corales Beach, the La Cana golf course and La Cana Beach and Golf Club, where you can join families, couples on honeymoon and golf enthusiasts alike enjoying the balmy weather and gorgeous scenery. Don’t miss the chance to visit nearby Ojos Indigenas Ecological Park, where you can hike through an unspoiled Dominican Republic landscape and dip your toes into a dozen natural pools.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Overlooking Cove Lagoon and just two minutes away from the pristine two half mile white sand beaches of Maundays and Cove Bay, Mystique at Sheriva is one of Anguilla’s top luxury boutique villas. Located in the chic West End, the villa is situated on a lush 10-acre alcove with stunning views of the Caribbean Sea and St. Martin. The property offers ultimate privacy, yet swift access to the island’s finest beaches, boutiques and restaurants.

This expansive villa offers three swimming pools, a hot tub and an alfresco shower. The elegant spaces offer tech-savvy comforts such as plasma televisions, DVD players, poolside Bose surround sound and Wi-Fi so that your stay can be as relaxing or as festive as you desire. Fire up the barbeque and enjoy some outdoor dining as you overlook the tropical landscape. A complimentary golf cart helps you zip around the grounds. You can also stay on top of your workouts in the exercise room. Your reservation includes housekeeping, night security and a variety of perks.

Nestled behind an artfully designed wall, this boutique villa represents the discerning traveler’s choice for luxury escape. With two bridges leading into the main floor living areas and expansive travertine decks, Mystique at Sheriva is the perfect choice for moonlit dinner parties or intimate wedding receptions. Contemporary and opulent furnishings anoint every corner of this villa – ambience is key.

The master bedrooms, fittingly called the Grand Villa Suites, are plush retreats with double showers, signature infinity-edge bathtubs, generous dressing closets and sitting nooks with daybeds for enjoying afternoon tea or simply relaxing before a sunset massage. The Loft Junior Suite sits atop the villa with a private balcony, kitchenette and direct access to the rooftop terrace. The six bedrooms at Mystique at Sheriva accommodate up to fourteen guests.

Service at Mystique at Sheriva is paramount. At your request, be spoiled by your private villa chef’s sumptuous creations and ask the concierge to arrange anything you desire, from rejuvenating spa treatments to shopping excursions in St. Barth’s. The villa is perfect for family get-togethers and corporate retreats. Additional rate-inclusive services include a welcome wine basket, afternoon canapés, complimentary shuttle service to Maundays Bay beach, beach chairs and umbrellas as well as signing privileges at Cap Juluca’s three world class restaurants – Pimms, Blu and Spice. Come experience the best of paradise in sunny Anguilla!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Laid back tropical comfort meets exquisite taste at Villa Guappa. The design and architecture of this stunning vacation rental offers an idyllic ambience on an exclusive oceanfront/golf-front location in a picturesque setting of the Dominican Republic. Awake to the sound of the sea, the year round breeze and the songs of mockingbirds. Get the holiday you deserve with Luxury Retreats!

The perks at Villa Guappa have been set to overdrive. Enjoy a refreshing dip in the private swimming pool with a built-in hot tub. The grounds have been decked out for the consummate entertainer with an Argentinian-style grill, alfresco wet bar and an outdoor sound system. With a palapa, sun loungers and heat lamps, the terrace awaits both day and night. Inside, you will find cable television, a sound system, another wet bar and complimentary Wi-Fi. Your reservation includes housekeeping, security, chef and laundry services as well as access to the Residents’ Beach Club.

The open plan interiors with high ceilings at Villa Guappa are bright and airy. In the living area, the padded rattan furniture and thatched ceilings create a quintessential Caribbean ambience. You will also find a formal dining area for fourteen as well as a professional and spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances. This enchanting villa makes a great bed for weddings and special celebrations.

For those serene and lazy vacation nights, seven luxury suites accommodate up to fourteen guests, including children of all ages. One master bedroom includes a king size bed and breathtaking ocean and golf views. Three bedrooms offer a pair of double beds each, as well as views of the tropical gardens. Each bedroom is air conditioned and includes an en-suite bathroom. You will find a variety of sleeping arrangements for everyone in the family.

Known for its stunning beaches, let the lapping ocean waves and the rhythms of merengue sweep you away in Punta Cana. This easy going island culture welcomes you to experience its riches to the fullest. Take a walk on the wild side and enjoy cave exploring, zip lining, whale watching and catamaran rides. Swim with dolphins and sea lions, or catch a speedboat over to Isla Saona with a stop at a sand bar for a quick swim in starfish-filled waters. However you choose to explore, start your vacation at Villa Guappa for the ultimate Caribbean experience!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Tamarind House means different things to the people who have already experienced its beauty and legendary hospitality. The rare luxury of space and privacy. Room to relax, to breathe, to rejuvenate and dream. Happy memories of drinks and laughter under the tamarind tree. Long white curtains billowing in the breeze. Swimming in the pool under a full moon. Bouganvillea climbing the walls - fuchsia, violet and orange flowers set against a clear blue sea and sky. Rum cocktails and fish cakes at sunset.

Tamarind House is located just off the Anse Chastanet Road; just under two miles from Soufriere and five minutes from Anse Chastanet beach. This exceptionally large house is constructed of local stone with high greenheart ceilings and Barbados tile floors throughout.

A staircase descending from the car park, leads you into a cool, circular courtyard filled with banana plants and flowers. As you pass through the graceful arched doorway, the enormous  living room stretches away before you and leads to the terrace where the tamarind tree grows up out of the tiles. This fabulous tree provides the home with shade cooler temperatures throughout the day.  

The extensive, totally private pool is situated below the Cottage and looks out over a stunning view of the Pitons. Below the pool, there is a professional size tennis court with a Bioflex surface and, of course, more superb views of the Pitons.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Discover the way indoor-outdoor living is meant to be at Makana on Discovery Bay. This beautifully designed Jamaica vacation rental tempts guests outdoors with its oceanfront setting and private beach—and brings the water views indoors with its open architecture. Seven bedrooms and a full staff make this luxury residence ideal for up to fourteen friends or family members.

Your holiday at Makana includes the services of a cook, butler, housekeeper and nighttime security staff. An infinity pool, hot tub, lit tennis court, alfresco lounging and dining areas, and a waterfront gazebo will make you feel like you’re staying at your very own resort, while provided kayaks and snorkeling equipment make it easy to explore the bay. To round out the amenities, there’s also an air-conditioned exercise room, bar and Wi-Fi.

A broad, shaded living area joins the terrace with the villa’s interiors for a seamless transition between the outside and in. Stone floors and wood trim are a polished backdrop for a casual, comfortable mix of traditional silhouettes and wicker seating in the living and dining rooms. While the exercise room and bedrooms are air conditioned, you can keep the main living areas cool simply by opening the doors to the terrace.

Makana has five bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a jetted tub, living area and its own balcony. There is also one bedroom with two queen beds and one bedroom with two twin beds. All seven bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.

From the villa’s beachfront location on Discovery Bay, it’s a short drive to the natural wonders of the Green Grotto Caves and the manmade challenges of the Runaway Bay Golf Course. If you’re interested in the history of the area, don’t miss a visit to the open-air museum at Columbus Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located in the Dominican Republic’s highly-coveted Punta Cana Resort community, Villa Arrecife is the perfect home base for an unforgettable beach vacation, golf trip, destination wedding, and any other occasion worth celebrating in luxurious tropical style. The resort community stretches twenty-six square miles of gorgeous tropical environment, including pristine beachfront, crystal clear waters, and amazing coral systems. Nearby, you’ll find golf, tennis, shopping, dining, spa services, and plenty of beautiful beachfront in and around the Punta Cana Resort.

Villa Arrecife doesn’t just exist in this beautiful tropical setting, it fully embraces and integrates itself into it. With large openings and numerous windows to promote the free flow of fresh ocean breeze, natural sunlight, and relaxed guests, this airy beach villa has an atmosphere like no other. The interior decor is stately with its arched doorways, chandelier-lit foyer, and intricate wrought-iron railings. Yet, the soothing earth-tones of stone, wood, and floral accents remind Arrecife’s elegant areas of the beauty beyond its walls. In the kitchen, your inner chef will love the thick granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a functional working layout.

At dinner, the formal dining area inside features seating for twelve. If you’d prefer to dine outside, the alfresco set on the terrace has seating for six, with lots of extra lounge space around it. While you’re outside, enjoy a cocktail from the wet bar, have a late night swim in the infinity pool, or just lay back in a sun lounger and watch golfers attempt to navigate the terrace-side fairway.

First things first, let’s get to the beach. Playa Blanca and Clubhouse Beach are both just a two-minute drive from Arrecife, and both are absolutely gorgeous. And, if you get hungry, Playa Blanca features an excellent restaurant, of the same name, at its entrance. If there’s a golfer in the group, La Cana Golf Club is just two minutes from home. And, if you’d like to treat yourself to a day of pampering, Spa 6 Senses is also just two minutes from the villa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Spend a vacation to remember at this waterfront home that offers some of the most beautiful views in all of Bonaire. A small Dutch Caribbean island famous for its year round temperate, gorgeous sunsets and fantastic coral reefs, Bonaire has earned the nickname “Divers Paradise” for good reason. With such creative names as Alice in Wonderland, 1000 Steps and Weber’s Joy, squids, rays and seahorses are some of the countless curious creatures you will see as you explore the pristine turquoise waters around Punto Perfecto.

Punto Perfecto is set right on the ocean, giving you panoramic ocean views throughout the estate. Soak in the fiery patterns of the majestic sunsets in the evenings. The backyard is made up of a multi-level terrace, where you can spend a lazy afternoon reading under the thatch-roofed gazebo, fire up the grill for a casual lunch or go for a swim in the saltwater pool. Feel like testing out your snorkeling gear? The villa’s steps lead directly to the ocean!

The expansive interior spaces at Punto Perfecto include an open air living room with plenty of seating for you and your guests. The decor is minimalistic and uncluttered, with modern furnishings and exotic accent pieces. On the top floor, the kitchen comes fully equipped and leads onto a covered deck with open air dining facilities. Indoors, you will find a media room, satellite television, DVD player, Wi-Fi and laundry facilities, so you should feel right at home in this spectacular tropical climate. Housekeeping and a villa manager are included with your reservation.

Four genial bedrooms accommodate up to eight guests at Punto Perfecto. All of the bedrooms include double beds and air conditioning, and there is one master suite. Access to the outdoors is a breeze!

Go snorkeling right in front of the villa or choose from dozens of exceptional dive sites just minutes away. Spend a day windsurfing on the lagoon or visit one of the island’s white sand beaches. Punto Perfecto is just a short drive to the city of Kralendijk with its selection of international restaurants. And if you can’t get enough wildlife in the sea, nearby Washington Slagbaai Park, the first nature sanctuary of the Netherlands Antilles, houses colorful beauties like flamingo, iguana and that regal bird of prey, the “Wara Wara.”

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Discover a piece of heaven on Paradise Island at On Beach Time. Part of an exclusive gated community on the island’s western edge that’s only accessible by boat, this beachfront Bahamas vacation rental is just minutes from Nassau Harbour but feels like its own tranquil world. With generous modern living spaces and three suite-style bedrooms, the villa can accommodate up to eight guests in five-star luxury for a warm-weather family holiday, getaway with friends or postcard-perfect tropical honeymoon.

There are no roads leading to On Beach Time, but the captain of your complimentary boat service will take you right to your private boat dock. Once you’ve arrived, spend your stay swimming in the turquoise ocean waters or in the oceanfront saltwater pool or stretched out on a sun lounger on the terrace, listening to the waves roll in. For lunch or dinner, heat up the charcoal barbecue and sit down at the al-fresco dining area. Active guests can use the fitness facility to keep up with their routines; those who just want to relax will appreciate the Apple TV and Wi-Fi.

Inside its stately exterior, the villa is open, bright and modern, thanks to neutral tones, pale wood and plenty of French doors in the great room. Two sofas, a natural-fiber rug and seashell accents make for a relaxed sitting area with a beachy vibe, and the dining area can easily seat eight in linen-hued chairs. There’s also seating at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen, where slight tinges of gray in the wood cabinetry echo the colors of driftwood outside. In the den next to the great room, the same neutral elements are used to create a more intimate effect in the smaller space.

Each of the three bedrooms at On Beach Time has an en-suite bathroom. The master suite has a king bed and opens to a balcony, a second bedroom has a queen bed and opens to a balcony and the third bedroom has two twin trundle beds. For larger parties or those needing more flexible accommodations, there’s a sofa bed and en-suite bathroom in the den.

Leave the driving for your everyday life—at On Beach Time, you can walk to the beach or take a boat to nearby attractions. Paradise Beach is at your doorstep, Paradise Island Beach Club is 12 minutes away on foot and The Four Seasons Ocean Club is a 15-minute walk away. Ask the boat captain to take you to downtown Nassau, about 5 minutes away, Prince George Wharf or Bahamas Fast Ferries, about 8 minutes away, or  the scenery of Blue Lagoon Island, 12 minutes away. Even the Harbour Bay Shopping Centre, Paradise Island Golf Club and Western Esplanade Beach are only 15 minutes across the water. When it’s time to return to the real world, plan on a 5-minute boat ride followed by an 18 km drive to Lynden Pindling International Airport.

listing.listing_description:
With its large terrace boasting panoramic views, Balinese finishes and furnishings and modern decor, this home in The Garden, is one of our Barbados vacation rentals that is not to be missed. A playground for the rich and famous, Barbados is an ideal gateway for visitors pursuing sun, fine dining and high-end shopping.

The villa’s expansive covered and open terrace is flanked on either side by lush tropical gardens offering plenty of privacy. A stunning infinity-edge pool appears to blend into the sea, and offers a refreshing spot to cool down on a hot day—it also lights up at for a night swim under the stars. Located under the covered portion of the terrace, the large dining area offers a spot for alfresco meals while post-dinner plans can include watching a movie in the air-conditioned media room.

Completed in 2007, the interior of this exquisite home boasts natural coral stone walls, hardwood flooring and custom-made Indonesian furnishings. The spacious living room opens up to the terrace through large sliding doors, and boasts Balinese stone carvings and luxurious wicker furnishings with white cushions. The fully equipped kitchen is located under the covered portion of the terrace and includes a barbecue grill.

Offering five spacious air-conditioned bedrooms, the Tom Tom will comfortably sleep up to 10 guests. Four rooms are located on the home’s ground floor with the fifth bedroom sitting on the upper level. Two master suites boast four-poster king size beds and open up to a private tropical courtyard with breathtaking views.

Holetown is located a short five-minute drive away, where you can enjoy shopping, spa services, Caribbean and international restaurants as well vibrant nightlife. Also close by is the popular Royal Westmoreland Golf Course along with many popular fine dining restaurants.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located in the heart of Gustavia, positioned to capture the sun setting over the ocean, minutes from world class beaches, boutiques and restaurants, this luxury vacation rental has everything you could ask for.

With accommodations for eight, formal dining for ten, and an abundance of indoor and outdoor space, this beautiful private villa is perfect for vacationing with family and friends. Features include a fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar, Sonos sound system, satellite television, and a wine cellar. Outside on the balcony you’ll find plenty of space to lounge around the infinity pool and watch the sun set in one of many relaxing outdoor living areas.

Axel Rocks is a truly breathtaking example of modern architecture. Clean sight lines, minimalistic designer furnishings and large open-concept common areas show off a simple sophistication that is so hard to get right. But it’s not just right, it’s perfect. Subtle placements of color direct your attention around the villa highlighting its unique features, while floor to ceiling glass windows and doors let the ocean view remain the focal point of your stay.

Each one of the four bedrooms at Axel Rocks has a queen sized bed, furnished private terrace, an ocean view, ensuite bathroom, satellite TV, and a mini fridge. All of the fixtures and appliances are absolutely top of the line both in form and function.

Nearby, you’ll find plenty of options for day or night excursions. Walk the Colombier Beach Trail and find yourself on a secluded beach with seemingly crystal clear water, only accessible by foot and boat. Later, watch the sun go down from a beach front lounge, or dance the night away at one of Gustavia’s many exciting clubs, all within minutes of the villa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find your joy in the sparkling ocean, warm breezes and smooth fairways at Campo Bliss. Part of the exclusive Casa de Campo resort, this luxury Dominican Republic vacation rental is its own piece of Caribbean paradise, from its oceanfront location to its easy access to the beach and several golf courses. Personalized service, six suite-style bedrooms and chic, airy interiors give the villa all the pampering and style of your very own private boutique hotel.

Your stay at Campo Bliss includes the services of a cook, waiter, housekeeper, groundskeeper and property manager, leaving you free to spend time with your family during your beach holiday or lounge with your sweetheart on your tropical honeymoon. And there is ample opportunity to relax at the villa: on one of the loungers on the sunny terrace, in the pool that stretches toward the water, in the hot tub overlooking the ocean or on the putting green. You can even take advantage of the warm Caribbean nights by heating up the barbecue and enjoying dinner at the al-fresco dining area.

Fold-back walls, vaulted ceilings with windows near the peaks and wicker and rattan furniture blur the lines between indoors and out. Breezes waft freely through the bright great room, where wicker sofas with plump white cushions are arranged with armchairs around several coffee tables to create multiple conversation areas. A welcoming round table and wicker armchairs give the same trad yet relaxed feel in the dining area, and in the fully equipped kitchen, a breakfast bar makes it easy to stop off for a snack or cup of coffee.

With so many outstanding amenities in the common areas, it’s no surprise that the six suite-style bedrooms are equally well appointed. There are three bedrooms with king beds and three with two double beds each; all have en-suite bathrooms and ocean views. Classic blue and white bedding, drapes and accent pillows create a look that’s both fresh and traditional, and red accents on upholstered benches or piped pillows is a jaunty touch in keeping with the seaside vibe.

Start your stay at Campo Bliss with a flight into La Romana International Airport, 5.5 miles away, Punta Cana International Airport, 48 miles away, or Las Americas International Airport, 63 miles away. From the villa, it’s about 3 miles to the sands of Minitas Beach and the restaurants and vendors in downtown La Romana. Golfers will want to book tee times at nearby Dye Fore Golf Course, La Romana Country Club and La Estancia Golf Club. And of course, it’s always worth the 47-mile day trip to Punta Cana for the chance to stroll the famously beautiful beaches.

Copyright © 2016 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Like an ivory sculpture on the majestic cliffs overlooking Anguilla’s Little Bay, the six bedroom Ani South has been designed to offer an unforgettable Caribbean vacation. Unique to Ani South is its configuration, accessible to guests via an elevator, roll-in showers, pool lift and wheelchair access – all subtly designed within the home’s conceptualization. At Ani South, the amenities of a world class resort and the privacy of an enclave combine to offer you the ultimate carefree and sun soaked holiday!

Have a splash in the heated infinity swimming pool. Or perhaps a soothing soak in the dramatic cliff-edge hot tub? Other resort-themed perks include a roof lounge, golf carts, mountain bikes, pool lift and a night-lit tennis court with cabana lounge. A gas grill sets the tone for exquisite alfresco dining. Indoors, you will find a media room, a shared exercise room, billiards table and games room. Wi-Fi access and baby equipment are also provided. Ani’s impeccable service will have you hooked. The staff includes a breakfast chef, master chef, two butlers, a cocktail specialist and a tennis instructor. Beach bags are packed with snorkel gear and the staff ‘magically’ get there before you to set up. How about a gourmet meal with a white-linen dining table right by the ocean?

The sleek furnishings and contemporary finishes provide clear views of the Caribbean Sea from almost every angle at Ani South. Wake up to breathtaking sea and sky hues from your bedroom each new morning. The interiors are clean, bright and modern, with naturally hewn wooden furniture serving as accent pieces throughout. Breeze through indoors and out for a casually elegant island experience!

The six stunning bedrooms at Ani South accommodate up to twelve guests. All of the bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ceiling fans. All three master bedrooms (with direct outdoor access) as well as the indoor and outdoor living spaces are oriented towards the breathtaking western view down the Anguilla coastline and towards evening sunsets.

The experience at Ani South is further enhanced by Anguilla’s unsurpassed collection of shockingly white sand beaches, crystal clear turquoise waters, an amazing assortment of local and fine dining restaurants alongside a warm and welcoming local population. Anguilla delivers sophisticated luxury travel while retaining its laid back island charm. The cliff-edge wedding deck also makes Ani a great venue for special events. Come experience a fresh tropical tempo!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This premium St. Barts villa seems to hang in suspended sunlight over a dream-like beach at Flamands. With a bright, attractive exterior, hillside shrubs and trees frame a heated pool and sun terrace complete with alfresco dining table and relaxed seating area. A vibrant kitchen and welcoming bedrooms round out a home close to golden beaches, happening Gustavia, and chilled-out boat trips.

Awakening to the soft sheets and crafted furniture of the home’s bedrooms, guests can breakfast in the soft sea breeze of the terrace, as light shimmers in the shaded depths of the pool. Spend a relaxing morning reading or checking out the home’s extensive entertainment options, before logging onto the WiFi to choose from a range of day trip outings. Returning in the evening, the home’s gas barbecue is a great option for grilling up fresh vegetables and locally-sourced seafood and meats. Watch the sky turn brilliant hues of orange and red, as you sip a fresh cocktail made with artisanal ingredients and tropical fruits.

Rapidly access no less than 5 beaches from this home, with the Flamands and St Jean beaches being a short drive away. A range of boating and cruise activities abound, ranging from group yacht trips, to private boat charters and snorkeling expeditions to offshore coral reefs. The historic streets, happening restaurants and lively bar scene of Gustavia is just a short drive away, with spa and yoga options at the Cheval Blanc hotel, located just yards from the villa.

 Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This airy hilltop villa offers a jaw-dropping view of the Cruz Bay area. As a sea breeze blows up from the turquoise water of Caneel Bay below, guests can spy sailboats and nearby islands cutting through the stunning blue seascape. The villa’s pool, carved stone interiors, wet bar, and fully-equipped entertainment system round out the welcome, as the island’s beaches and bars beckon from below.

Privacy is built into the DNA of the villa, with no neighbouring buildings and a completely private gated entrance, allowing guests to soak up the leafy, natural ambience of the Virgin Islands National Park (which the property sits adjacent to) in total seclusion. Recline in serenity in the villa’s shady courtyard, or take up a prime sunbathing position in the supplied recliners that dot the poolside terrace. With a media room and fully-outfitted living room, guests can enjoy the comforts of this roomy villa in any way they see fit, before taking to the alfresco dining area for an evening barbecue of stunningly-fresh, locally-caught fish, complete with island delicacies and produce.

Isla Vista also offers easy access to a number of renowned beaches, such as Honeymoon Beach, where crystal clear water and sea turtles abound. Guests can wile away the sunlit days on these beaches, or take a chartered cruise to dive under the waves, experiencing schools of tropical fish and majestic rays via professional guided outings. The buzzing town of Cruz Bay, complete with energy-filled bars and some of the finest seafood restaurants in the Carribean are just a few minutes away. After a fun night out, return to the peaceful ambience of the villa, and savor a refreshing cocktail as the lights of the town below flicker and moonlight plays on the waves of the sea below.  

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With 7 Mile Beach in your backyard and ocean views in every bedroom, you’ll be feeling that fresh sea breeze 24/7 at this beachfront villa in the Caymans. Catch up on some reading under the shade of a hay-thatched palapa. Get a golden vacation-tan in a beachfront sun lounger. Or chill out in the air conditioning. Then, head to Camana Bay for dinner, and maybe a little shopping.

 From the exterior, sunny pastels and palm trees decorate this sandy property. Inside, cream-white walls, ocean-inspired art, and contemporary furniture add a touch of beach-chic glamour. The kids will love the games lounge and when they’ve gone to bed, the older kids probably will too, especially after a trip to the wet bar. After a few games of pool, head to the rooftop hot tub and relax.

 In the afternoon, pick up some fresh seafood and produce from the local market for a backyard barbeque. Gather the crew around the alfresco dining table and show off your grill skills. After the appropriate 30-minutes, hop into a kayak or grab a paddleboard and move the party to the sea. Before dinner, recharge your batteries with a late-afternoon nap in one of the sunbeds.

 Meet some of the local critters at Stingray City. Explore the underwater wreckage of the USS Kittiwake with Cayman Turtle Divers, just off 7 Mile Beach. Golfers in the group will definitely want to check out the course at North Sound. Later, head to George Town for dinner followed by beachfront cocktails at sunset. Then, hit Obar Nightclub and dance the night away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Sunset Beach Villa is a pristine vacation rental located in Leeward Estates, in the prestigious Grace Bay area of the Turks and Caicos. Just a two minute walk from the powdery white sands of this world renown beach. This luxury retreat provides a private villa experience within an ambience reminiscent of a beachside boutique hotel. Truly capture the essence of indoor/outdoor Caribbean living and make this holiday one for the books!

No matter how much you love to wade and splash in the turquoise waters of the Caribbean Sea, you will no doubt enjoy having the convenience of a private swimming pool and alfresco shower right at home. The back of the villa opens up to an expansive outdoor area with a shaded terrace, beautiful pool area and elegant native landscaping. To optimize your beach holiday, this villa also provides use beach chairs and rafts as well as a cooler and beach towels. The covered outdoor kitchen has been equipped with a Weber S Series grill sits amid multiple entertaining areas for guests and family.

The great room's open concept design with vaulted ceilings and A-frame windows provide a vast amount of natural light and visual space. This open space comprises a living area with a sectional couch and a television next to the contemporary formal dining area. The fully equipped kitchen features Quartz counter-tops, custom cabinetry, stainless steel appliances and a center island breakfast bar. We recommend this villa for a family holiday, a sunny beach honeymoon or an easy breezy social event such as a reunions, retreats, milestone birthdays and anniversaries.

Five exquisite bedrooms accommodate up to ten guests at this non-smoking, air-conditioned villa. Each bedroom includes an en-suite bathroom, television, ceiling fan and a flat screen TV. The four master suites offers a king bed, and the other suite have two twin beds. The villa also includes a crisp, hotel-style linen package in each suite.

In 2015, Grace Bay was awarded TripAdvisor’s coveted ‘Traveler’s Choice’ award for the top quality of its pure white sands and turquoise waters. Nearby outdoor activities include kite surfing, snorkeling and scuba diving. Nature lovers should be sure to check out Little Water Cay, a natural habitat full of friendly iguanas. You will also find the Provo Golf Club nearby, one of the most consistently top ranked courses in the Caribbean.

listing.listing_description:
Trade in your bustling city life for salty sea breezes, balmy evenings, and endless adventures. This posh villa is encompassed by gently swaying evergreen palms and unique golf views. A stone pathway, set into the manicured lawn, leads to the main entrance which takes guests directly to the heart of the horseshoe-shaped property. Golf clubs, tennis courts, and spas are a short, scenic drive away. 

Located in an exclusive gated community in Punta Cana, privacy and seclusion are main features of this equatorial paradise. An expansive terrace, surrounded by lush foliage, is a serene spot to relax. The spacious, open kitchen is designed with elegant marble countertops and glass doors that open onto the back garden. An exquisite chandelier, featuring over 30 bulbs, drips over the dining room’s glass table. Dive into the turquoise-hued swimming pool before snagging a spot under the patio parasols. Plenty of wicker seating under the loggia can host your whole crew. 

Indulge in the tropical lifestyle by snorkeling, deep sea fishing, scuba diving, windsurfing, or sailing—all of which are readily available nearby. Colorful coral reefs, crystal clear waters, and sugar-white sand are waiting to be explored. Rent a golf cart to easily get around the resort. Spend an afternoon relaxing on the pristine shores at Catalina Island or book a ziplining excursion to really get your adrenaline pumping.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perched above Anse des Lorient, Golden View enjoys incredible vistas of the bay from its many shared spaces, and two luxurious king en-suite bedrooms. From its prestigious location in the Camaruche Hills, you’ll have easy access to so many of St. Bart’s beautiful beaches, natural wonders, and the island’s vibrant capital city, Gustavia. With the beach just four minutes away, and Golden View’s lavish accommodations, you’re sure to fall in love with St. Bart’s on your next Luxury Retreats vacation.

Although close to many of St. Bart’s attractions, Golden View enjoys a serene, private atmosphere thanks to its hillside perch and lush tropical greenery. The villa itself boasts a calming vibe, with white walls, lightly toned wood, and simplistic decor. Golden View celebrates its environmental surroundings with numerous openings and outdoor living areas that allow fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight to fill interior spaces. Each bedroom is outfitted with a king bed, a walk-in closet, a sound system, air conditioning, and a private balcony. As well, each bedroom has a lavishly adorned en-suite with a rain shower.

Golden View’s beautiful terrace is a great place to enjoy a meal, relax in the sun, and lounge the night away in its furnished living area and alfresco dining set. In the afternoon, the infinity swimming pool is the place to be. And, no matter what time of day, the ocean view is absolutely incredible. Back inside, you’ll appreciate satellite television, Wi-Fi, a sound system, and a well-equipped fitness room.

St. Bart’s is the perfect escape if you’re looking to relax on the beach, explore a lush tropical environment, and enjoy some vibrant island nightlife. Start your day at Saint Barthelemy Nature Reserve, where you’ll surely meet some of the Caribbean’s friendliest critters, both land, and sea. After, head to Anse de Lorient Beach to soak up the sun and surf. After the beach, head west to Gustavia for delicious seafood, beachfront bars, boutique shops, and exciting island nightlife.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The Great House accommodates 16 guests – eight in the main house and eight in the four chattel houses. However, an additional four guests may be accommodated for an additional fee.

Consider this a warning: once you’ve stepped foot into this gated property in Turtle Beach, you might not want to leave. Offering a vast amount of amenities, lush gardens and plenty of space, this is one of our best villas in Barbados for a large group traveling together. Barbados offers a perfect Caribbean getaway thanks to its tranquil waters, vibrant nightlife options and warm climate.

One of the most exciting aspects of staying in this home is that you’ll have access to its 30-foot pleasure boat, manned by the villa’s boatman this vessel is available during the day to guests for just the price of fuel. It can be used for waterskiing or wakeboarding or to travel to a neighboring beach. Other amenities include kayaks, a laser sailboat and snorkel gear, though the backyard’s centerpiece is its large, heated pool, complete with a deck outfitted with cushioned lounge chairs. There are plenty more places to lounge with a drink in hand on a sofa or chair on one of the villa’s wrap-around covered terraces.

Inside, the airy entrance hall boasts an elegant winding staircase, from here, head towards one of the several reception rooms and sitting areas offering plush sofas in muted colors with lots of throw pillows and access to the terrace (there’s also a piano room if you’re musically inclined). The fully equipped kitchen offers a range of appliances that range from a tabletop grill to a blender for afternoon cocktails, but let the on-site kitchen staff handle things.

This home can host up to 16 people in its eight bedrooms, as well as an extra four upon request. Four rooms are found in the main home while the remaining suites are located in separate chattel houses. All rooms include Ralph Lauren linens, air conditioning and en-suite bathrooms.

You’ll be just steps away from snorkeling and swimming in Mullins Beach, and a five-minute drive to the nearby gym and tennis courts. Meanwhile, it’s a quick 10-minute walk to the restaurants, sites and shops in historic Speightstown.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A pyramid rises, Louvre-like, from beside a reflecting pool in the garden of this one-of-a-kind contemporary retreat on Pointe Milou. The villa faces north and west over the ocean for spectacular sunset views, but its outdoor entertaining areas are shaded by a thoughtfully designed cantilevered roof, lest the sun get in your eyes. Swim and snorkel off palm-lined Marigot Beach, 3 minutes away. 

After you’re escorted to the villa and welcomed by the staff, you can dip into the infinity pool, take a book to one of the loungers on the terrace, or put something fresh from the sea on the barbecue to savor at the al-fresco dining table while you watch the sun go down. Once you’ve seen the stars come out, go inside to flip on the Apple TV and integrated sound system or share photos with family and friends at home via Wi-Fi. 

Slide-away glass walls are a seamless link between the pool terrace and the great room at this luxury property. Small statues watch over the living and dining areas, which are separated from the sleek fully equipped kitchen by a curved countertop. 

Each of the three bedrooms at this vacation rental has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and air conditioning. Two of the bedrooms have honeymoon-suite-worthy private terraces with plunge pools, while the third bedroom has a private terrace with a hot tub. 

While on holiday at Pyramide, you’re a 10-minute drive or less from four gorgeous beaches, including the clear waters of Marigot Beach and surfer-favorite Lorient Beach. Bring your camera or your dive equipment to Saint Barthelemy Nature Reserve, where several reefs and wrecks are waiting to be explored, and your appetite to picturesque Gustavia, where dining and shopping options abound in traditional red-roofed buildings. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Punta Cana, on the easternmost edge of the Dominican Republic, is world-renowned for its beaches, golf, spas, eco-adventures, and pure natural beauty. At this five-bedroom villa within the deluxe Punta Cana Resort, you'll be ideally situated to enjoy this confluence of Caribbean delights, while relishing the privacy of your own sanctuary.

Surrounded by lush tropical flora, this two-floor vacation rental features a large outdoor terrace with swimming pool. Poolside loungers, a sun bed, a hammock strung between palms, and a lounge area beneath a lovely lattice-work cover give you ample relaxation options in sun or shade. In the evening, fix cocktails at the covered wet bar before dining at the alfresco table for eight. Excellent lighting keeps the terrace luminous throughout the night.

Several sets of white French doors open into the spacious interior. With high ceilings, classy but comfortable furniture, and fresh breezes blowing in, the living room is ideal for late-night conversation among family and friends. There is also a formal dining area with a beautiful wooden table for eight, as well as a fully equipped kitchen. The décor epitomizes modern Caribbean elegance.

The bedrooms are comfortable but cool, ideal for siestas in the warm afternoon or sleeping in after a festive night. There are four bedrooms in the main house: the master suite with king size bed and doors to the pool terrace, a second room with king bed, and two rooms with two full size beds. All of the main-house bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone showers. There's also a guesthouse with king bed and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and stand-alone bathtub. Each of the rooms has beautiful windows for welcoming the breeze.

Located within the Punta Cana Resort and Club, the villa gives you effortless access to myriad options for leisure and adventure. Hop in the golf car and ride about five minutes to the beach at La Cana Beach Club or to the resort's private tennis courts and golf club. Treat yourself to a day at Spa 6 Senses, also only minutes away. And when you're in the mood for eco-adventure, don't miss the nearby Ojos Indígenas Ecological Park and Reserve, a somewhat off-radar gem with tropical forest hikes and crystalline swimming lagoons.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This extraordinary estate style villa enchants the moment you enter the gate. The long, palm-lined drive brings you to a large private courtyard and garden. Beyond the front door is a stunning house and one of the most dazzling oceans views on island. Panoramic vistas flow from every room and terrace. The colors are magical. An expansive stretch of sapphire sea is framed by the villa’s gardens and the rich blue sky. The large contoured pool edges overlap the lawn adding crystal blue tones to the scene.

The house is open, airy and spacious; a perfect villa for an extended family, weddings or company retreat. It has everything you need to enjoy the day from dawn until dusk. The overall décor is sleek, elegant and contemporary but never boring. The large interior living room, perfect for conversation or entertainment, tastefully mixes natural elements and rich tones; dark wood and teak, wicker, cream and pops of color. Pocket doors disappear into the walls enhancing the view. Although sea views and breezes abound, the great room is fully air conditioned.

The interior dining room sits adjacent to the unique kitchen area. Divided into two rooms, half the space is devoted to a gorgeous chef’s kitchen with flat screen TV. The other half is a fabulous gathering space with bar and seating. A cozy al fresco dining area sits in the courtyard just off the bar. Deep covered terraces and open sundecks surround the house, the main pool and lap pool. Comfortable lounges and dining spaces abound.

The four equal size bedrooms are spacious and comfortable. Two sit on each end of the villa. The décor creates a serene atmosphere blending designer touches and art; neutral tones of beige, brown, black or grey and white with individual pops of rich color. Each room has private seating, sea views and beautiful spa style bathrooms in travertine, stone and wood. Three bathrooms have private outdoor showers; one has a sea view.

Although secluded, you are close to amenities. It’s a short drive to Plum Bay Beach and five minutes to the airport. In 10 minutes you reach the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops and galleries, historic buildings and Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case and Philipsburg’s shopping haven.

listing.listing_description:
This breezy beach home resides within a gated estate, right on the sandy shores of the Caribbean Sea. Private and secluded, White Cottage is a five-bedroom beachfront getaway with everything you'll need for your next amazing Luxury retreats vacation.

With an open-concept main-floor living space and a full, ocean-facing, wall of glass openings, White Cottage is easily filled with fresh air and natural sunlight. Inside, the decor is simplistic, yet elegant. Bright splashes of ocean-inspired color add a touch of the outdoors to the pristine, white interior. State of the art electronics and modern designer furniture set the tone in the living room. You'll also have Wi-Fi, a house tablet, television, sound system, and air conditioning. In the kitchen, high-end appliances, an espresso machine, dishwasher, and washer/dryer are seamlessly integrated into the all-white cabinetry. And, there's a breakfast bar around the kitchen island with seating for five and a formal dining area with space for eight. At bedtime, they'll be no fighting over "the good room" as all five have amazing ocean views.

The White Cottage's beachfront-backyard is ready and waiting to fulfill all your beach vacation dreams. On the terrace, you'll find dining and living areas, a shaded gazebo, sound system, barbecue, and a refreshing swimming pool. Just beyond the pool deck, the sandy beachfront begins. Decorated with palm trees, sun loungers, beach furniture, a hammock, and a ping-pong table the beach has plenty to keep you busy. And, White Cottage comes equipped with a kayak, stand-up paddleboard, and other beach/pool toys.

Approximately three kilometers outside of your gated beachfront estate, you'll find a grocery store, local restaurants, and Watersport based tourist activities and excursions. Travel inland and you can visit the Queen Elizabeth Botanic Park and The East End Marshland Natural Habitat; both are great environmental areas if you wish to learn a little more about Grand Cayman's wildlife.

_ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Sleek Asian-inspired architecture meets the brilliant colors of the Caribbean at Kyreve. Not only is this St. Barts vacation rental beautifully designed, it's perfectly situated on a Lurin hillside to make the most of its stunning views over neighboring hills and the azure waters of St. Jean Bay. Every detail of this four-bedroom luxury residence has been thought out-so you and up to eight friends or family members can simply relax.

Your holiday at Kyreve begins with an escort to the property, a meet and greet, and welcome gifts, and includes the services of an on-island villa manager and housekeeper. You'll quickly ease into a routine of coffee with a view at the al-fresco sitting area, followed by reading on a lounger in the sun or swimming in the infinity pool. Start the evening with dinner from the barbecue and finish by pouring a glass from the wine fridge and unwinding by the TV and Wi-Fi.

The villa's interiors take their cues from Asian design principles, which are reflected in the clean lines, vaulted ceilings and natural materials of the open-concept great room. The simple white sofas and dining table for eight are inviting places to gather, while huge windows frame the gorgeous ocean vistas. Aspiring chefs will be tempted by the fully equipped modern kitchen; everyone else will be tempted by the breakfast bar.

Each of the four bedrooms at Kyreve has a king bed and en-suite bathroom; two of the bedrooms open to private terraces and two open to a sun deck. All four suites have separate entrances, so they can be used as couples' retreats within the property.

The villa is less than 15 minutes by car from Gustavia, the island's charming capital, where you'll find shopping, dining and nightlife. It's also just a short drive from several of the island's best beaches; relive your honeymoon with a stroll along the relatively quiet Gouverneur Beach or join the jet set on the shores of St. Jean and Nikki beaches.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A beach-entry pool and the golden sands of Plum Bay Beach are the double feature on show at this Mediterranean-style St. Martin estate. Tiled roofs and loggias curve around a verdant lawn and the pool, which itself curves around a swim-up bar as a water feature jets toward the sky. Bring snorkel gear and surfboards on the 10-minute walk to Plum Bay Beach—or a towel to lay on its golden sands.

Kids of all ages will want to play with the pool toys and whoosh down the waterslide in the two heated pools. For the grown-ups in the family, there’s also an al-fresco bar, barbecue, and lounging and dining areas, as well as a private tennis court. There’s a gym to help you keep up with your routine, a wine cooler to help you indulge, and a full staff to help keep you comfortable on holiday.

Follow the polished stone floors across the veranda to the sleek interiors of this contemporary home, which can be walled off using glass or opened to the tropical breeze. White upholstery and glass tables lend an airy feel to the dining room, while a pair of built-in sectionals beckons in the living room. While there is chef service, there’s also a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.

This vacation rental has five bedrooms with king beds, several of which open to their own terrace, one bedroom with a queen bed, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All seven bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and TVs.

A 10-minute walk brings you from this luxury Terres Basses enclave to Plum Bay Beach, where you can snorkel, surf, or join honeymooners on the soft golden sand. It’s a 3-minute drive to the white-sand stretch of Long Bay Beach, where you might spot the occasional celeb, and a 5-minute drive to Baie Rouge, which gets its name from its pale pink sand.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that this villa is close to a construction project ending in January 2020. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

Experience true peace and serenity with this pristine, beachfront Turks and Caicos mansion. Located on the golden sands of Grace Bay Beach, guests can walk from the cooled interior, under the latticework overhang, to the gentle surf and private dock. With every creature comfort and an impressive selection of premium bedrooms, local golf courses, tennis courts and seaside bars beckon from nearby.

The slow rhythms of the ocean govern this island, with the steady surf and rustle of the palm trees casting their spell over guests at Vision Beach. Awaken each morning to dappled sunlight reflecting off the water and illuminating the dark wood and white fabrics of the bedrooms. Sparse, tasteful art pieces dot the home, with an impressive set of glass shades overhanging the impressive dining table. The home’s gym and media room are great choices for escaping the midday heat, with the pool being a great option for rapidly cooling off.

This villa offers unrivalled access to a pristine beach. Unimpeded by other homes, guests can experience acre after acre of sand, water, and serene horizons. Take things to the next level with paddle boarding or kayaking around the shallows, or enjoy a vigorous afternoon at the local tennis or golf clubs, located just a short drive away. Return after an active day to the sizzling barbecue, to savor local seafood or freshly-caught crab, along with a cooling drink as the sun sinks into the darkening water that laps at the edges of the property.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
