listing.listing_description:
Wild Orchid’s name foreshadows the natural splendor you’ll discover at this grand, St. Lucia villa. Located in the hills of the exclusive Cap Estate at the northernmost tip of the island, this unique home, surrounded by lush green palms, bright bougainvillea and mature gardens, offers an inspired panoramic view of the Caribbean Sea and Atlantic.

Flower-trimmed trellises skirt the wide, tiled terrace where you can take your pick of cushioned sunbathing chairs. A dip in the immense pool will cool you down again. Grill fresh seafood on the outdoor barbecue and enjoy it at a round table on the terrace. A few steps up, on the veranda, an 8 person dining table is the perfect for dinner al fresco.

Lofty French doors and windows allow St. Lucia’s famous trade winds to circulate freely inside. A bright, tropical color palette of turquoise, fuchsia, yellow and green is daubed liberally on furnishings and decor throughout the villa. The cozy living room opens on 3 sides under vaulted ceilings of local wood. A second living area is found on the veranda and a modern, fully-equipped kitchen is the perfect place to create memorable meals.

10 guests can sleep comfortably at Wild Orchid. Each of the 5 bedrooms is decorated with charming island fabrics and include air conditioning. The master bedroom occupies the entire second floor and features 2 private decks with views of both land and water. 2 other bedrooms are located on the first floor, each with its own en-suite bathroom. A separate apartment houses the last 2 rooms with a shared double-sink bathroom.

When you’re ready to explore, Cap Estate’s privacy quickly gives way to the hub of St. Lucia’s social and cultural life: Rodney Bay. It’s just a 10 minute drive to Gros Islet where you can shop, dine or just watch the boats go in and out of the marina. Nearby Pigeon Island is a great place to lay on the beach or do a little snorkeling. The estate is also home to an 18-hole golf course.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Beautifully situated near Rum Point on a secluded stretch of white-sand beach along the northern coast of Grand Cayman, Fischer's Reef is a dreamy, beachfront luxury villa perfectly designed for ocean-view entertainment and relaxation. With comfortable accommodations for fourteen people, including kid-friendly bedrooms and a crib, the villa is an ideal vacation rental for destination wedding guests and families seeking exquisite privacy and style on their Cayman Islands getaway. Accommodations for sixteen and benefits from Silver Thatch Guest Services make it an excellent choice for families or large groups of friends seeking a stylish and private alternative to a hotel or resort.

Surrounded by picturesque palm trees, the villa features a stunning infinite swimming pool and ocean-view terrace, from which you'll step directly onto the pristine, white-sand shore of the Caribbean Sea. Savor long days and evenings swimming in the turquoise waters, swaying in palm-strung hammocks, bathing on poolside sun loungers, and sipping cocktails in the cabana pavilion with its comfortable furnishings and lovely lanterns. Closer to the villa, in the shade of the second-floor veranda, a large, alfresco dining area invites you to delicious meals in the ocean breeze.

Wide glass doors open from the terrace into the villa's luminous living-and-dining area, where the open plan creates the perfect setting for festive and relaxing evenings. The dining tables, running parallel to the alfresco tables on the patio, seat twenty for memorable feasts, while the comfortable living room includes multiple cozy sofas and a flat screen TV. In the adjoining room, the fully equipped kitchen includes a charming breakfast table beside ocean-view glass doors to the exterior.

The villa features four bedrooms with king beds, three with queens, and one with two twin-size bunk beds (perfect for kids). All eight bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms, and four feature beautiful ocean views. The master bedroom includes a walk-in closet and a private, ocean-view balcony, and its ensuite bathroom has a stand-alone shower and bathtub. The bedrooms are furnished and decorated with an elegant simplicity that captures and emphasizes the island's natural beauty and incomparable light.

While giving you privacy and seclusion on the island's beautiful northern shore, Fischer's reef is just a mile from Rum Point Club, with its restaurants and fun activities for visitors of all ages.

_ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _

listing.listing_description:
Discover a private enclave of contemporary design in the middle of a Caribbean paradise at Yarari Royale. This newly built vacation rental is one of the finest luxury properties in Punta Cana, thanks to its chic minimalist style, resort-worthy amenities and personalized service. Plan your escape to the Dominican Republic with up to twenty friends or family members.

Your holiday at Yarari Royale begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a chef and housekeeper. This spectacular villa is laid out around a swimming pool and terrace with plenty of loungers and daybeds, so you’ll have ample opportunity to enjoy the tropical sunshine. There’s also a sand volleyball court, barbecue and al-fresco dining area, plus an indoor bar, fitness room, games area and high-tech amenities from Apple TV to Wi-Fi.

Folding glass doors open the villa’s interiors to the terrace for a breezy, relaxed feel. The two living rooms and dining room are spacious, sleek and modern, with clean-lined furniture in neutral tones and geometric accent pieces. Though chef service is included at breakfast, lunch and dinner, there is a fully equipped kitchen.

The villa has three bedrooms with king beds and six bedrooms with two queen beds each; all nine bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning. While all the bedrooms are stylish and comfortable, the king bedrooms are honeymoon-worthy suites with features such as private terraces, hot tubs and an al-fresco bathtub.

Guests of Yarari Royale are welcome to make the 20-minute walk or the short drive to use the shared beach club, bars and pool at the luxe Eden Roc hotel and club at Cap Cana. It’s also just a 20-minute walk to the Punta Espada Golf Course, ranked as one of the best in the Caribbean, and less than a 10-minute drive to the postcard-perfect white sands of Juanillo Beach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
